relations.description: Sales Order Header to Sales Order Details. One sales order can contain multiple line items representing individual products or services.
Quotation Header to Sales Order Header. A quotation may result in zero, one, or multiple sales orders, enabling quotation-to-order conversion analysis.
Lead or Customer Master to Sales Order Header. A customer or lead can place multiple sales orders over time.
Sales Order Details to Schedules. A single sales order line can have multiple delivery schedules for phased or partial deliveries.
Sales Order Header to Schedules (derived relationship). A sales order can have multiple schedules across its line items, useful for fulfillment and logistics analysis.
